item.description:
Hey Incubators!!!

My improv troupe, Lost Marbles, is putting on a show Saturday on the very same floor that we incubate on!

Come out after dinner on Saturday night for a laugh riot of dessert. Lost Marbles performs their wacky blend of improv games this Saturday night.

Come check it out this Saturday night at 7pm at The Democracy Center (45 Mt. Auburn Street) in Harvard Square, Cambridge, MA. Tickets are $10 at the door.

Email us to put your name on will call.

Not sure what to expect from Lost Marbles improv Comedy?? Think of the tv show "Who's Line is It Anyway?" with a bit o' Boston attitude and clam chowda on the side.

So come on out and if you must, pawk ya caw in hawvawd yawd.

Cheers!

The Lost Marbles!

Here's the facebook link if you want to be even cooler and of course to invite your friends. And also by all means tweet it up people!

http://www.facebook.c...

Rock on!

Jason J.
item.how_to_find_us: Funny is still legal in Cambridge!
item.name: This Saturday, Lost Marbles presents: Harvard Square Gone Bonkers!
